resources.string: Logging will only happen if this option is checked.
Choose between the blacklist and the whitelist.
Disable to hide the icon of this app in your launcher.
Setup the filter to act on or ignore certain activity components.
Quickly enable/disable the module if it\'s causing problems, without having to reboot.
All \'acceptable\' activities will be forced to start in a new task, except those added to the blacklist.\n%1$s
Only \'acceptable\' activities that are also in the whitelist will be forced to start in a new task.\n%1$s
Whenever an \'acceptable\' activity is started, a log entry will be created for it. You can tap an entry to automatically add it to the currently used filtering mode.\n%1$s
